text: % Recurrent singultus 90% Abnormality of temperature regulation 7.5% Cerebral ischemia 7.5% Coronary artery disease 7.5% Dehydration 7.5% Diabetes insipidus 7.5% Neoplasm of the nervous system 7.5% Renal insufficiency 7.5% Sleep disturbance 7.5% The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
